value.string: To fetch the employee record who matches with business Criteria
Read the input file and apply the business filters . Send an email on work anniversary.
Validating whether input file is available or not. If not present BOT sents an email and stop the execution
SQL Query to identify the employee work anniversary and send an email

SELECT DISTINCT (s.[Employee ID]),s.[Email - Primary Work],s.[Manager Email],FORMAT(s.[Current Hire Date],"yyyy-mm-dd"),DATEDIFF("yyyy",s.[Current Hire Date],DATE()),[Preferred Name in Reporting Display Format]  FROM [Sheet1$] AS s 
WHERE s.[Status] = 'Active' AND ((s.[Cost Center - Name] LIKE 'IT%') OR (s.[Cost Center - Name] = 'Commercial - IT')) AND (MONTH(s.[Current Hire Date]) = MONTH(DATE()) AND DAY(s.[Current Hire Date]) = DAY(DATE())) AND s.[Employee / Contingent] = 'Employee'
Reading output file and assigning to variable and sending email to employee.
